headline: Akamai Technologies (AKAM) Outperforms Broader Market: What You Need to Know
summary: In the closing of the recent trading day, Akamai Technologies (AKAM) stood at $93.36, denoting a +0.89% change from the preceding trading day.

headline: Akamai Technologies: Long-Term Narrative Doesn't Matter Until Delivery Improves (Rating Downgrade)
summary: Akamai's restructuring measures are positive, but insufficient to offset Delivery's negative impact. Read why I downgrade AKAM stock from buy to hold.
